metadata.title: CVE-2015-4156 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
GNU Parallel before 20150522 (Nepal), when using (1) --cat or (2) --fifowith --sshlogin, allows local users to write to arbitrary files via asymlink attack on a temporary file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

parallel - 20161222-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: parallel package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161222-1').
